name: Dandelion's Journey (Darkbuilder646, Oxyo)
description:
Dandelion's Journey, a game where you play a seed flying in the sky, aiming to be a beautiful flower.

This game is the result of a 2 week school gamejam at E-artsup Lille

Enzo Ducourtioux : Game Design / Game Art

Theo Lejeune : Game Design / UI Design

Ugo Manno : Game Design / Developer 

How to install :

1/ Download 

2/ Extract the files

3/ Launch Dandelion's Journey.exe

4/ Enjoy
